snippet: On opening night of “The Library,” no second thoughts from Steven Soderbergh about retirement.
abstract: Director Steven Soderbergh has announced his retirement from filmmaking in favor of several new projects, including directing plays and importing brandy; Soderbergh evidences no second thoughts about move while at opening of play The Library, which he directed at Public Theater.
lead_paragraph: On opening night of “The Library,” no second thoughts from Steven Soderbergh about retirement.

headline.print_headline: A Filmmaker Relishes His Next Act(s)
headline.main: A Filmmaker Relishes His Next Act(s)
